channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS

item.title: Report X-2024051702
item.description:
Report X-2024051702

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED OUT FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER PICKED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT BACK THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED THAT THERE WAS ONE OF TWO BOTTLES TO BE LEAKING.

item.title: Report X-2024051538
item.description:
Report X-2024051538

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-20
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE UNLOAD WITH FULL PPE ON. USING THE DECISION TREE THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND PLACED ALL MATERIAL IN A LINED SPILL TUB. THE RESPONDER TRANSPORTED THE MATERIAL TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER NOTED THAT ONE 2.5 LITER BOTTLE WAS LEAKING FROM THE CAP. ALL MATERIAL WAS DISPOSED OF THROUGH DMP.
